This is in contrast with the stall in growth observed in WT DP-ablated follicles. Intriguingly, surrounding mesenchymal cells were observed to broadly contact the newly formed hair growths, although they failed to spatially self-organize like DP clusters. This induction of a new mesenchyme around the growth is consistent with previous work (Collins et al., 2011; Gat et al., 1998; Silva-Vargas et al., 2005).
